column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////All their meats are aged 28 days giving everything a rich
column2: deep and robustly beefy flavor and texture. I got the 20 oz. ribeye which was cooked perfectly
column3: no need for the extra table side steak salt. We also got the lamb which was also very well and richly flavored. The sides were good though were only sides: roasted heirloom tomatoes and cole slaw. For dessert
column4: we got the cantaloupe sorbet which was surprisingly overly sweet though good; compliments of mint or some brighter flavor would have brought more balance to the dessert.
